overview: An exciting 'psychic movie' starring Kanako Enomoto, adapted from the manga series by Yukio Tamai. Police detectives searching for clues related to a serial murder case seek out help from high schooler Yurika, who possesses latent split personality psychic abilities. The mystery deepens once Yurika is brought face-to-face with the crime scenes.
tagline: When hatred causes fresh blood to flow... The young girl Yurika becomes a vicious executioner!
title: Yurika-chan
